CustomField.description: Required when Implementation Type is 'Apex' or 'Flow'. For 'Apex', this is the name of the Apex class. For 'Flow', this is the API Name of the Flow. This field is ignored for 'Standard' implementations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Type is 'Apex', enter the Apex class name (e.g., MyCustomAction). If Type is 'Flow', enter the Flow's API Name (e.g., My_Update_Case_Flow). Ignored for 'Standard'.
CustomField.label: Implementation Detail
